shortdesc.ph: SDK operation permissions for Audio Session.
Permissions for SDK operations on the Audio Session.
SDK's operation permissions for Audio Session.
SDK operation permissions for Audio Session.

plentry.pd: 0: No restriction. The SDK can modify the Audio Session.
1: The SDK cannot change the Audio Session category.
2: The SDK cannot change the Audio Session category, mode, or categoryOptions.
4: When leaving the channel, the SDK keeps the Audio Session active, for example, to play audio in the background.
128: Completely restricts the SDK from operating on the Audio Session. The SDK can no longer make any changes to the Audio Session.
0: No restriction. The SDK can modify the Audio Session.
1: The SDK cannot modify the category of the Audio Session.
2: The SDK cannot modify the category, mode, or categoryOptions of the Audio Session.
4: When leaving the channel, the SDK keeps the Audio Session active, such as for playing audio in the background.
128: Fully restricts the SDK from operating on the Audio Session. The SDK can no longer make any changes to the Audio Session.
0: No restriction. SDK can modify the Audio Session.
1: SDK cannot change the Audio Session category.
2: SDK cannot change the Audio Session category, mode, or categoryOptions.
4: When leaving the channel, the SDK keeps the Audio Session active, for example, to continue audio playback in the background.
128: Fully restricts the SDK's operation permissions for Audio Session. SDK cannot make any changes to the Audio Session.
0: No restriction. SDK can modify the Audio Session.
1: SDK cannot change the Audio Session category.
2: SDK cannot change the Audio Session's category, mode, or categoryOptions.
4: When leaving the channel, SDK keeps the Audio Session active, e.g., for background audio playback.
128: Fully restricts SDK from modifying Audio Session. SDK can no longer make any changes.
